artist: Artist: Pietro D'Asaro (called il Monocolo di Racalmuto); Artist: Formerly attributed to Pietro Novelli (called il Monrealese)
description: recto: figures seated around a table at left; some standing figures at right; dog, LRC; Jesus seated, left of center, with a zigzag halo; verso: bottom half of sheet--Mary, Joseph and two other figures seated in a semicircle around baby Jesus; Mary and Joseph have zigzag halos; top half of sheet--light black chalk sketch of Madonna and Child
medium: Pen and brown ink; pen and brown ink and wash, on ivory laid paper
provenance: [Yvonne Tan Bunzl, London]; ['Adolphe Stein, London]; [Bury Street Gallery, London, in 1981, as by Pietro Novelli]; sale, Christie's, London, July 5, 1988, as by Novelli, for Â£1,100, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1988-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: The Last Supper (recto); Adoration of the Shepherds (verso)
